question: As per the World Trade Organization (WTO), what is the growth of World merchandise trade in the year 2020?
explanation:
According to the World Trade Organizationâ€™s (WTO) revised trade forecast, the World merchandise trade is expected to fall by 9.2 percent in 2020.
However, the WTO also estimated that the world will record a 7.2 percent rise in the year 2021. Earlier in the month of April, WTO had predicted that the volume of world merchandise trade would decline between 13 percent and 32 percent for 2020.
